parameters.name: DomainId
parameters.description: The identifier of the domain that you are describing.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the domain.

nested_items.name: CreatedAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the domain was created.

nested_items.name: DomainStatus
nested_items.description: The current status of the domain.

nested_items.name: ServerSideEncryptionConfiguration
nested_items.description: The server-side encryption configuration containing the KMS key identifier you want Voice ID to use to encrypt your data.

nested_items.name: KmsKeyId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the KMS key to use to encrypt data stored by Voice ID. Voice ID doesn't support asymmetric customer managed keys.

nested_items.name: ServerSideEncryptionUpdateDetails
nested_items.description: Details about the most recent server-side encryption configuration update. When the server-side encryption configuration is changed, dependency on the old KMS key is removed through an asynchronous process. When this update is complete, the domain's data can only be accessed using the new KMS key.

nested_items.name: Message
nested_items.description: Message explaining the current UpdateStatus. When the UpdateStatus is FAILED, this message explains the cause of the failure.

nested_items.name: OldKmsKeyId
nested_items.description: The previous KMS key ID the domain was encrypted with, before ServerSideEncryptionConfiguration was updated to a new KMS key ID.

nested_items.name: UpdateStatus
nested_items.description: Status of the server-side encryption update. During an update, if there is an issue with the domain's current or old KMS key ID, such as an inaccessible or disabled key, then the status is FAILED. In order to resolve this, the key needs to be made accessible, and then an UpdateDomain call with the existing server-side encryption configuration will re-attempt this update process.

nested_items.name: UpdatedAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the domain was last update.

nested_items.name: WatchlistDetails
nested_items.description: The watchlist details of a domain. Contains the default watchlist ID of the domain.

nested_items.name: DefaultWatchlistId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the default watchlist.
